channel.title: Papers with Code: Trending (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: LLaMA-Omni: Seamless Speech Interaction with Large Language Models
item.description: We build our model based on the latest Llama-3. 1-8B-Instruct model.

item.title: OmniGen: Unified Image Generation
item.description: In this work, we introduce OmniGen, a new diffusion model for unified image generation.

item.title: Kolmogorov-Arnold Transformer
item.description: In this paper, we introduce the Kolmogorov-Arnold Transformer (KAT), a novel architecture that replaces MLP layers with Kolmogorov-Arnold Network (KAN) layers to enhance the expressiveness and performance of the model.

item.title: optillm
item.description: Optimizing inference proxy for LLMs

item.title: PuLID: Pure and Lightning ID Customization via Contrastive Alignment
item.description: We propose Pure and Lightning ID customization (PuLID), a novel tuning-free ID customization method for text-to-image generation.

item.title: Symbolic Prompt Program Search: A Structure-Aware Approach to Efficient Compile-Time Prompt Optimization
item.description: In many modern LLM applications, such as retrieval augmented generation, prompts have become programs themselves.

item.title: Breaking reCAPTCHAv2
item.description: Our work examines the efficacy of employing advanced machine learning methods to solve captchas from Google's reCAPTCHAv2 system.

item.title: GeoCalib: Learning Single-image Calibration with Geometric Optimization
item.description: This single-image calibration can benefit various downstream applications like image editing and 3D mapping.

item.title: OneGen: Efficient One-Pass Unified Generation and Retrieval for LLMs
item.description: This paper introduces a novel and efficient One-pass Generation and retrieval framework (OneGen), designed to improve LLMs' performance on tasks that require both generation and retrieval.

item.title: Wings: Learning Multimodal LLMs without Text-only Forgetting
item.description: Initially, image and text inputs are aligned with visual learners operating alongside the main attention, balancing focus on visual elements.

item.title: Vista3D: Unravel the 3D Darkside of a Single Image
item.description: We embark on the age-old quest: unveiling the hidden dimensions of objects from mere glimpses of their visible parts.

item.title: MemoRAG: Moving towards Next-Gen RAG Via Memory-Inspired Knowledge Discovery
item.description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) leverages retrieval tools to access external databases, thereby enhancing the generation quality of large language models (LLMs) through optimized context.

item.title: Qwen2-VL: Enhancing Vision-Language Model's Perception of the World at Any Resolution
item.description: We present the Qwen2-VL Series, an advanced upgrade of the previous Qwen-VL models that redefines the conventional predetermined-resolution approach in visual processing.

item.title: SOAP: Improving and Stabilizing Shampoo using Adam
item.description: Furthermore, since SOAP is equivalent to running Adam in a rotated space, it introduces only one additional hyperparameter (the preconditioning frequency) compared to Adam.

item.title: On the limits of agency in agent-based models
item.description: In this paper, we introduce AgentTorch -- a framework that scales ABMs to millions of agents while capturing high-resolution agent behavior using LLMs.

item.title: Qwen2.5-Coder Technical Report
item.description: In this report, we introduce the Qwen2. 5-Coder series, a significant upgrade from its predecessor, CodeQwen1. 5.

item.title: iText2KG: Incremental Knowledge Graphs Construction Using Large Language Models
item.description: Our method demonstrates superior performance compared to baseline methods across three scenarios: converting scientific papers to graphs, websites to graphs, and CVs to graphs.

item.title: Fine-Tuning Image-Conditional Diffusion Models is Easier than You Think
item.description: Recent work showed that large diffusion models can be reused as highly precise monocular depth estimators by casting depth estimation as an image-conditional image generation task.

item.title: RePlay: a Recommendation Framework for Experimentation and Production Use
item.description: Using a single tool to build and compare recommender systems significantly reduces the time to market for new models.

item.title: Enhancing Sample Efficiency and Exploration in Reinforcement Learning through the Integration of Diffusion Models and Proximal Policy Optimization
item.description: Recent advancements in reinforcement learning (RL) have been fueled by large-scale data and deep neural networks, particularly for high-dimensional and complex tasks.
